title: Urgent Opening: Content Manager/ Associate with ITM @ Navi Mumbai
tagsAndSkills: Content Associate,Communication Skills,Content Manager,Content Development,E-learning,Workbooks,Captivate,Trainer

ambitionBoxData.Title: Itm Edutech Training Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Job Opening for Content Manager/Associate with ITM Group Of Institutions at Navi Mumbai



NOTE- If Interested mail me your updated CV on akshadak@itm.edu or you can call us on 8591998175



Desired Candidate Profile

Education: Graduate with Added qualification in Training/Instructional Design

Salary: Commensurate with experience and knowledge.

Experience: 5 to 8 yrs.



SPECIALIZED KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS:

  • Knowledge of e-learning tools Captivate, Articulate (Desirable)
  • Excellent written communication skills with a flair for proof-reading and creative writing.


TECHNICAL SKILL SET:

  • Good hands-on, working-knowledge of MS Word, Excel and power point, Experience in content creation


Key Responsibility Areas

  • Possess strong knowledge and prior experience of creating Instructor Led Training Modules Including Workbooks and Handbooks
  • Understanding structured writing techniques, modular content development and the instructional development lifecycle (analyzing needs through evaluating, and maintaining courses)
  • Proven track record of designing and creating compelling, training courses for audiences that include customers and employees
  • Intermediate knowledge of Articulate Storyline or similar elearning authoring tools
  • Intermediate knowledge of Learning Management Systems
  • Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail
  • Basic knowledge of graphics and tools
  • Proficient in MS Office tools
  • The person is expected to create training manuals primarily for English and Behavioral domain for PGDM students based on few inputs, identifying and adding necessary content on their own, under minimum supervision.
  • Conduct training needs analysis and measure effectiveness of training
  • Work directly with internal subject matter experts and external consultants for relevant content needs to meet functional and behavioral Training requirements of the teams.
  • Ability to work under pressure and deliver within timelines
  • Collaborate with other members of the curriculum development and training team to brainstorm, problem-solve, and review each others work
  • Work with subject matter experts on other teams who provide knowledge transfer (to enable appropriate course content and lab scenarios with functional results)
  • Assist with management of course development projects including scoping the required resources and timeline to meet project timelines with quality results
  • Produce quality ITM course material (including course design documents, course outlines, course descriptions, presentation slides, diagrams, lab exercises, instructor guides, lab setup guides, job aids, and assessments
  • Design measurement instruments and create advanced learning activities questions for quizzes and certification exams

title: IT Support Specialist  (Tier 3)
tagsAndSkills: Troubleshooting Skills,OS Installation,Microsoft Windows,Windows OS,Software Installation,LAN Setup,Hardware Troubleshooting,Operating Systems
jobDescription:
IT Support Specialist (Tier 3)

Position: Tier 3 Helpdesk

Experience : Minimum 5 years


Job Description:

Position Overview: We are seeking motivated and adaptable candidates for Tier 1, 2, and 3 IT support positions. The ideal candidates will be quick learners, able to take direction, self-motivated, and capable of working effectively both independently and as part of a team in a production environment. The ability to self-learn outside of work hours is essential for growth in this role.

Requirements:

  • Must speak English fluently.
  • Must have clear written grammar for all communications in English.
  • Must have internet access (subsidized by the company).
  • The company will provide a computer and headset.
  • Shifts are available 24/7, with priority given to candidates who can work Eastern Standard Time (EST).

Responsibilities:

  • Install and configure computer hardware, operating systems, and applications.
  • Diagnose and troubleshoot hardware and software issues.
  • Provide guidance to staff or clients to set up systems or resolve issues, either face-to-face or over the phone.
  • Replace parts as required.
  • Provide support, including procedural documentation and relevant reports.
  • Follow diagrams and written instructions to repair faults or set up systems.
  • Support the roll-out of new applications.
  • Set up new user accounts and profiles, and address password issues.
  • Work continuously on tasks until completion or referral to third parties, if appropriate.
  • Log all support requests and incidents in the helpdesk ticketing system.
  • Prioritize and manage multiple open cases at one time.
  • Escalate unresolved issues to the next level of support as necessary.
  • Conduct remote troubleshooting and diagnostics using available tools.
  • Assist with the management and maintenance of user accounts and permissions in various systems.
  • Monitor and respond to system alerts and notifications.
  • Provide excellent customer service and maintain a positive, professional attitude.

Skills and Qualifications:

  • Problem Solving
  • Basic LAN Knowledge
  • Verbal Communication
  • Operating System Knowledge
  • Phone Skills
  • Customer Service
  • Quality Focus
  • Proficiency with all Microsoft OSes and Office
  • Troubleshooting and configuring firewalls, routers, switches, and access points
  • Experience with helpdesk ticketing systems and remote support tools

Benefits and Perks:

  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Opportunities for professional development and career growth.
  • Exposure to cutting-edge technologies and projects in a collaborative work environment.

Working Hours: 6.30pm to 2.30am (1st shift) - Strictly Work from Office


Company address: SAI CHAMBER, Office No. 206, Plot Number :44, Sector No:11, CBD Belapur, Navi Mumbai-400614 ( just 60 seconds from Belapur Railway station)

title: Hiring Head of Finance with Datamatics-Andheri (Mumbai)
tagsAndSkills: Cfo,finance head,Financial Controllership,Financial Analysis,Finance Control,Head of Finance,VP Finance,Financial Control

placeholders.label: Mumbai Suburbs, Navi Mumbai, Mumbai (All Areas)

ambitionBoxData.Title: Datamatics Global Services Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Greetings!!!


This is in regards to a Job opportunity for Head of Finance with Datamatics Global Services Ltd.


About us: Datamatics is a technology company that builds intelligent solutions enabling data-driven businesses to digitally transform themselves through Robotics, Artificial Intelligence, Cloud, Mobility and Advanced Analytics. Headquartered in Mumbai, the company has a presence across America, Australia, Asia and Europe.


Position: Head of Finance

Website: https://www.datamatics.com/

Job Location: Andheri (E) - Mumbai


Job Description:

Job purpose

The ideal candidate will oversee all financial aspects of the organization globally, providing guidance and direction to ensure financial stability, compliance, and growth. The role would also oversee the Administration and the Travel team. This role requires a combination of financial expertise, leadership skills, and the ability to manage multiple International locations and lead geographically diverse teams.


Key responsibilities

  • Develop and implement financial strategies aligned with the company's goals and objectives. Provide strategic guidance to executive management on financial matters.
  • Lead the financial planning and analysis process, including budgeting, forecasting, and financial modeling. Provide insights and recommendations to optimize financial performance.
  • Oversee and ensure the accuracy of all financial accounting and reporting activities, maintaining compliance with internal policies and external regulations.
  • Ensure all statutory filings are completed accurately and submitted on time, adhering to all relevant regulatory guidelines and requirements.
  • Develop and maintain robust revenue and cash flow forecasting models to accurately predict future financial performance.
  • Apply strong business acumen and practical decision-making skills to drive the company's financial performance and support strategic growth initiatives.
  • Lead effective negotiations in financial discussions and contracts, securing favorable terms and conditions while fostering positive relationships with stakeholders.
  • Oversee and manage international teams, ensuring effective communication, cultural sensitivity, and alignment with corporate objectives
  • Serve as the primary liaison with investors, analysts, and financial institutions. Communicate financial performance, business strategies, and growth prospects effectively.
  • Participate in the project budgeting, ensuring accurate cost estimation, financial allocation, and continuous monitoring to stay within the budget.
  • Oversee the preparation of accurate and timely financial reports, including income statements, balance sheets, and cash flow statements. Ensure compliance with GAAP and other applicable accounting standards.
  • Develop tax strategies to minimize tax liabilities and ensure compliance with tax laws and regulations in all relevant jurisdictions.
  • Lead financial due diligence for potential mergers, acquisitions, and strategic partnerships. Evaluate financial implications and risks, and provide recommendations to executive management.
  • Maintain consistent and transparent communication with investors, providing regular updates on financial performance, business strategies, and growth prospects.
  • Strategically manage and allocate funds across international operations to optimize global investment returns and support business expansion
  • Drive continuous improvement initiatives to enhance financial processes, systems, and controls. Foster a culture of innovation, efficiency, and excellence within the finance function.
  • Oversee the administrative functions to ensure efficient and effective office operations, including facility management, procurement of office supplies, and coordination with external vendors.
  • Implement and enforce policies and procedures to maintain a productive and safe working environment, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and company standards.
  • Supervise the travel team to coordinate and manage all corporate travel arrangements, including booking flights, accommodations, and transportation.
  • Develop and implement cost-effective travel policies and procedures to optimize travel budgets while ensuring the safety and comfort of employees during business trips.

Qualifications & Desired Skills

  • 20+ years of work experience in Finance & Accounting with 10+ years as Head of Finance.
  • Proven experience as a CFO, Finance Head, or similar executive role in IT/ITES Company.
  • Strong financial acumen and analytical skills, with the ability to interpret complex financial data and make strategic recommendations.
  • Deep understanding of international finance, tax, and regulatory compliance requirements.
  • Experience leading financial planning, budgeting, and forecasting processes.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage and influence stakeholders at all levels.
  • Strong leadership capabilities, with a track record of building and developing high-performing teams.
  • Experience in handling Administration & Travel function will be a plus.
  • Strategic mindset, with the ability to anticipate future trends and proactively identify opportunities for growth and innovation.
  • Demonstrate strong leadership qualities, integrity, and professionalism, coupled with effective communication and interpersonal skills to inspire and motivate finance teams while fostering a collaborative and positive work environment.

  • Education: Chartered Accountant (CA) / Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) is a must. MBA-Finance will be a plus.

  • Competencies
    • Behavioral:
      • Planning & Result Orientation
      • Problem Solving & Decision Making
      • Leadership
      • People Management
      • Relationship management
      • Strategic Thinking
      • Communication
    • Technical:
      • Financial Analysis
      • Financial Reporting
      • Budgeting
      • Treasury Management
      • Tax Planning
      • Mergers & Acquisitions

title: Manager/ Assistant Manager- FP&A- 3+ Years- Mumbai
companyName: Crescendo Global Leadership Hiring India Private L Imited
tagsAndSkills: Financial Planning And Analysis,Financial Services,Business Finance,Strategic Finance,Cost Management,FPA,Variance Analysis,Cost
jobDescription:
Manager/Assistant Manager- FP&A- 3+ Years- Mumbai


We are looking for a talented Manager/ Assistant Manager working in FP&A with a minimum of 3 years of experience to join our team in Mumbai. If you're passionate about finance and strategy, this is an exciting opportunity to contribute to a dynamic organization.


Location: Mumbai


Responsibilities

  • Drive financial analysis and reporting for business performance evaluation
  • Support strategic decision-making through financial planning and forecasting
  • Manage budgeting and variance analysis processes
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support business initiatives
  • Provide insightful recommendations to optimize financial strategies

Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or related field
  • Minimum of 3 years of experience in business finance or financial analysis
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Proficiency in financial modeling and reporting tools
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities
  • Experience working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment

What's in it for you

  • Opportunity to work with a diverse and inclusive organization
  • Competitive compensation package
  • Professional development and growth opportunities
  • Collaborative and supportive work culture

Reach Us: If you feel this opportunity is well aligned with your career progression plans, please feel free to reach me with your updated profile at shambhavi.gupta@crescendogroup.in


Disclaimer: Crescendo Global specializes in Senior to C-level niche recruitment. We are passionate about empowering job seekers and employers with an engaging memorable job search and leadership hiring experience. Crescendo Global does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.


Note: We receive a lot of applications on a daily basis, so it becomes a bit difficult for us to get back to each candidate. Please assume that your profile has not been shortlisted in case you don't hear back from us in 1 week. Your patience is highly appreciated.


Profile keywords

Business Finance, Financial Analysis, Financial Reporting, Strategic Decision-making, Budgeting, Financial Planning, Forecasting

title: Digital Marketing Executive
tagsAndSkills: Lead Generation,Digital Marketing,Social Media Marketing,Performance Marketing,Marketing,Digital,Performance,Social media
jobDescription:
we are looking for a Digital Marketing person to assist in the planning, execution and optimization of our online/offline marketing efforts.

The promotion of products and services through various channels is a complex procedure with great potential which becomes increasingly useful for companies such as ours.

The ideal candidate will have a passion for all things marketing and technology.

You will be well-versed in the concepts surrounding digital marketing and how the Internet can become a strong asset to securing growing revenue.

You will be tech-savvy and intuitive with great ideas to reinforce our marketing campaign.


Roles and Responsibilities

  • Work with the team to brainstorm new and innovative growth strategies.
  • Plan and monitor campaign budgets.
  • Prepare accurate reports on our marketing campaigns overall performance.
  • Coordinate with the ATL/BTL and the presales team to improve marketing results.
  • Must have hands-on in-depth technical knowledge of Google GDN, adwords, FB, social media campaigns and should be able to run them independently.
  • Plan and manage our social media platforms. Evaluate important metrics that affect our website traffic, and target audience.
  • Manage and update content on the website & develop new landing pages.
  • Deploy performance marketing, CPC / SM campaigns to achieve lead generation targets for each project.
  • Should have the ability to engage with a digital marketing agency and also review their performance technically
  • Maintain partnerships with media agencies and vendors
  • Identify the latest trends and technologies affecting our industry.

Desired Candidate Profile

  • Masters degree in marketing, advertising or a related field
  • At least 2 years of experience writing for real estate audience, ability to communicate effectively with experience in a digital marketing or advertising position.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Highly creative with excellent analytical abilities.
  • In-depth knowledge of various social media platforms, best practices, and website analytics.
  • Understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is required.
  • Up-to-date on the latest trends and technologies in digital marketing.
  • Demonstrable experience leading and managing marketing across channels, email, social media and/or display advertising campaign.
